meanings.definition: inclined to agree with others or obey rules
meanings.sent1: The students were compliant and followed the teacher's instructions without any fuss.
meanings.sent2: She always tries to be compliant with the school's dress code to avoid any trouble.
meanings.sent3: The compliant puppy wagged its tail happily as it learned new tricks.
meanings.sent4: The garden, so compliant with the changing seasons, bloomed beautifully in spring.
meanings.sent5: Her compliant attitude made her a favorite among the strict supervisors.

meanings.definition: meeting or in accordance with rules or standards
meanings.sent1: The company's products are compliant with the industry regulations.
meanings.sent2: Make sure your work is compliant with the company's policies to avoid any issues.
meanings.sent3: The compliant cake followed the recipe perfectly and turned out delicious.
meanings.sent4: The artist's painting was compliant with the traditional style but had a modern twist.
meanings.sent5: The bridge's design was compliant with safety standards, ensuring no accidents occurred.
